{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which hemostatic agents are used as perforation repair, we need to understand the purpose of these agents. Hemostatic agents are used to control bleeding and promote clotting. Perforation repair, on the other hand, involves sealing or closing a hole or perforation in a tissue or organ. Therefore, we are looking for the hemostatic agent that is not typically used for perforation repair.", "answer_choice": "B"}
